Articles.Content:
Imagine, an AI controlled agency on another Kerbin continent. It's a space race to see which country can find the most science. You can choose to co-operate and build a joint space station, or annihilate them by making weapons to intercept their flights.. and bombers to destroy agency facilities. Each path would have it's own reward, but also consequences... because out of nowhere... ALIENS. A continent sparely populated with cities which generate income for their respective agency... protect them from aliens... again either by annihilating them or trying to friend them.

Yeah. I'd kick start that.

Sorry vrcommand but Squad will not be considering other aliens than the Kerbals themselves, and will not be adding weapons of any kind.

You can take a look in both the Spacecraft Exchange and Addon Releases sections for weapons made by the community though
